website_summaries.verdict: Nonslip, space-saving hangers in assorted colors, with two designs for both tops and heavier suits.
pros: Lightweight, sturdy hangers for everything from coats to dresses to pants
Half the hangers are for shirts, suits, and sweaters
others have extra bar for pants
Also available are extra bars, clips, cascading hooks, accessory hangers
cons: Several purchasers claim that hangers broke too easily or arrived broken
These hangers are twice the price of comparable hangers

customer_reviews.title: The Joy Mangano hangers I bought at Bed Bath and Beyond ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. I had about 6 out of the pack break while I just removed them from the pack. The Joy Mangano hangers I bought at Bed Bath and Beyond are a million times better. I assume these are not really Joy Mangano hangers
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.text: These hangars are not at all like the Joy Mangano hangers I purchased years ago from QVC. Half of the hangers made for shirts only, broke. Some of them snapped in half. Some if the metal parts just broke away from the hangar. Wr were always careful with the hangers. The hangers for the slacks are holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Zahorniak

customer_reviews.title: Decent hangers
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they are really Joy hangers but they look like them. I have Joy hangers and when compared I do see a few minor differences but had to look very close to find them. It’s possible it was just a few differences in the manufacturing. I would still buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Love hangers but quality has slipped
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying these hangers off a shopping network for years. I absolutely love them. I don’t have regular hangers in my house at all. That being said I noticed that the quality of these aren’t on par with the older ones that I have. My older ones are a little bit more sturdier. These were so not sturdy that one of them broke in shipping
customer_reviews.author: Janice Lumenti

customer_reviews.title: Joy, love your creation!
customer_reviews.text: Been using only joys for years. The copies are terrible, don't bother. I'll have to pay more I guess since I can't get them the way I want on Jan or qvc. Don't know why corporate always takes a good thing and dumps it. Shame.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Faulty hangers lead to disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I love these types of hangers because it is so compact in the closet. But I am extremely disappointed with these. 2 of the hangers were broken upon arrival. The hanger part is torn away from the body of the hanger. And just now I attempted to pack some clothes in a garment bag for an overnight trip and 3 of 5 hangers broke! The same thing as the first where the hook part separates from the body. I have several of these types of hangers and have never experienced this problem. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: Love these hangers!
customer_reviews.text: My closets are filled with these hangers. I had used cheaper knock offs, but they were too flexible and wobbly and the hook end pulled out. Or they brokr. These by Joy are sturdy. I prefer the thin size to fatter plastic as you can get mire garments onto the clothes rod. After getting over the sticker shock, I realuzed they are worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: J, a long-time Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hangers for slippery fabric
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are good for slippery fabric. Very hard to use for anything that is not slippery, due to extreme friction. They do snap when overweighted or when clothing is yanked off - it can be hard to get clothing off, due to the unexpected friction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Oh, these are great. Purchased them for travel suit bag but they may become our default hanger. The flocking makes dresses and shirts stick like crazy preventing light and open garments from falling to the floor and the underlying polymer is very tough and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Fishback

customer_reviews.title: Reno Nevada couple
customer_reviews.text: We replaced ALL our hangers from the plastic tube hangers to these. I love the FULL hanger but my husband likes his shirts on the open bottom ones. We love these, but don't buy the 'copies' as the neck brakes on the fake ones. We now buy ONLY Joy's.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great hangers
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to try these. I didn’t want to spend the extra money on hangers. Once I tried them I an hooked. It’s all I use in my closet now. Clothes still on the hangers! I’ve also bought these as wedding shower gifts. I put them in a basket with laundry supplies
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: the Navy hangers are so dark they look like they are black
customer_reviews.text: the picture shows a much lighter and prettier blue than the actual product. the Navy hangers are so dark they look like they are black,
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Reali

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers. They take up less room and the clothes stay on the hangers no matter what the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are a great value and are made exceptionally well!
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra dollar or two on these hangers! You will be happy you did! The quality is exceptional! I purchased the bargain packs from HomeGoods and before I knew it I was throwing them away one by one because they broke where the hook connects to the hanger. Frustrating and a waste of money:/ I still have the Joy hangers that I purchased 15 years ago hanging in my closet. They still look like new! I am glad that I found these on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: A. P. O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: An organizers MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: these are a must for organizing! I tried to buy a cheaper brand, and they’re super flimsy. This brand is amazing, and these hangers really let me fit over double the clothes!
customer_reviews.author: gina marie

customer_reviews.title: 2 broken hangers...
customer_reviews.text: I like the hangers, but 2 were broken. In that case I will just wait til I go to the store and buy some.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy for heavyweight clothing
customer_reviews.text: Not heavy duty strong. Hangers do not last long when heavyweight clothing items are hung up. They work well with lightweight clothing items. The metal hook detaches when the weight is too much.
customer_reviews.author: A. Herrerias

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hangers
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers. Keeps all of your close on the hanger and off the floor no matter the material. The sleek design also makes it less cluttered.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: The space they gave to buy more clothes
customer_reviews.text: Theses hangers are wonderful . I can’t believe I didn’t get rid of plastic hangers along time ago. The clothes stay on the hanger and I have so much more room. I never would think that the plastic hangers took up that much room.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and space saving!
customer_reviews.text: Initially bought a few to see if I liked them. They are the best ever and is incredibly space saving. I switched completely to the Joy Mangano hangers because they are very sturdy. Reviews indicate that some other brands break easily, but not the Joy hangers.
customer_reviews.author: S. D'Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with 6 of the shirt hangers broken disappoint to say the least now I have to go out of my way to return the item and I ordered a replacement which how do I know they won't be broken it was obvious looking at the product it was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Katz

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat Mangano hangers!
customer_reviews.text: Love Joy Mangano hangers. Better than other brands that have notches on the shoulders that wind up making marks on my clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Shaniqua Ann

customer_reviews.title: Won’t buy any other brand.
customer_reviews.text: I have replaced hundreds of hangers and these are the only ones that truly don’t cause those hanger bumps on the shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Lee

customer_reviews.title: Joy rules my closets
customer_reviews.text: Love the Joy hangers. Originally got them on HSN but grateful to find them on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Tsu Nami

customer_reviews.title: Saves space in the closet. Nothing slips off
customer_reviews.text: I like how slim they are and how nothing falls off. I would have given 5 stars but 1 order arrived with a broken hanger and two fell apart this past week. I use them for all of my Lularoe tops so the clothes are light weight
customer_reviews.author: Robin E Haldeman

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and closet friendly
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers. I have purchase many and have given as gifts also
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Matched my older hangers and at a reasonable price. Thanks for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: TexasTradition

customer_reviews.title: great!!!
customer_reviews.text: the best for no bumps on shirts. and really durable
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Quality hangars keep clothes from sliding off
customer_reviews.text: I love the huggable hangars. Just wish the price were lower. I bought these and then found similar versions for much less at Target and Costco and wished I had waited.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Settje

customer_reviews.title: Do what they advertise.
customer_reviews.text: No collar bumps, no unwanted creases in pants and blouses, pants do not fall off these hangers. Wouldn't have anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Honest to a fault.

customer_reviews.title: Loved this!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this item as it was exactly what I needed to organize my closet so perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: LorieAnn911Top Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Space-saving Hangers!
customer_reviews.text: Great Space Saving Hangers that do not damage your clothes.

customer_reviews.title: not for heavy clothes
customer_reviews.text: Tried to get a sweatshirt off one and it broke, saves some space but not much. Good for silky tops that’s about it

customer_reviews.title: Perfect professional clothing hanger
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge Joy hanger fan. I bought these for my sisters Airbnb home

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love them ! Don’t hesitate to purchase buy double. You will do all closets.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Slimline Hangers
customer_reviews.text: I am reorganizing my closet and these hangers are reasonable, sturdy and slim. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Best hangers available anywhere, period!
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness these are sold on Amazon. I used to buy them on HSN, but now they no longer carry them. I swear by these hangers! Can’t recommend them enough.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a space saver!

customer_reviews.title: Because Joy helps other inventors out

customer_reviews.text: I have a number of these hangers and love them, my clothes stay on the hanger and they are a ?or better quality than those i bought at the big box store

customer_reviews.title: Subpar durability
customer_reviews.text: These came with the hook broken off one already. A few weeks later a second one broke. They also don’t have the swivel hook like other ones I’ve bought in the past.

customer_reviews.title: Best hangers - I’m hooked!!
customer_reviews.text: I now have a walk in closet. Seriously! These hangers saved me so much space that I was able to completely transform my closet. In addition to saving space, they are super sturdy. They can hold my heavy leather jacket no problem. I’m hooked!!

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 set. One ser is black and the other is blue. They are durable and easy to use. I will buy more.

customer_reviews.title: Closet necessity
customer_reviews.text: No slipping of silky blouses, slim design allows more space in closet. These keep my closet neat and organized.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers. Don't take up much room and seem well made.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe cheaper is better??  Can I get a replacement??
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because it was Joy Mangano. I pull my shirt off and it breaks!!

customer_reviews.title: Best hangers ever
customer_reviews.text: There are great hangers makes me want to redo all my hangers to these.

customer_reviews.title: Best hangers
customer_reviews.text: Best hangers. Better to go with the name brand as I had one time purchased a knock off set and they are not made as well and ended up snapping some of them.

customer_reviews.title: Some arrived broken.
customer_reviews.text: Some arrived broken so I was disappointed but they are overall sturdy once they are hanging up.

customer_reviews.title: In Love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with these! My husband bought them as a present since I mentioned these to him many times. They actually turned out much better than I expected.

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love that they take up less space then the heavy plastic hangers & my clothes don't slip off these hangers.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hangers!
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find huggable hangers outside of HSN. These hangers are so sturdy and stylish. The Prime shipping was great!

customer_reviews.title: sturdy hangers
customer_reviews.text: I like these hangers for hanging my nice sweaters, tops and dresses. They are also strong enough to hang your coats. Had been ordering them from HSN, but they no longer sell this brand, Joy.

customer_reviews.title: Loved the look but easily broken
customer_reviews.text: The hangers were as expected and functioned as advertised but four were broken coming out of the package so be careful unwrapping. The hooks can snap off easily and there is no way to repair.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars

customer_reviews.title: Love them!

customer_reviews.title: These hangers are great. They're very sturdy (won't break easily like other ...
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are great. They're very sturdy (won't break easily like other brands) and keep my clothes from slipping off. I love that this package comes with both the shirt and pant hangers, too.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: All of my hangers are Joy's because they take up less space and they are durable. I like having all the hangers alike. Makes the closet look better.

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied!!!
customer_reviews.text: No it did not meet my satisfaction when I opened the amazon package I looked and seen that 6 of my dress hangers were broken!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: I like the little silver medallion on each hanger
customer_reviews.text: I like the little silver medallion on each hanger. It added a nice little pop to my designer shirts on display.

customer_reviews.title: great for organizing your closet
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time and is great for organizing my closet

customer_reviews.title: Made the closet leaner!
customer_reviews.text: No problems. Performed as expected. More space in the closet and quite durable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers! I have SO much more space. Clothes don’t slip off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these hangers and 4 of them have broken alreday! WHAT the heck?? Poorly made hangers...disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: These are great for keeping your clothes on the hanger and undamaged
customer_reviews.text: These are great for keeping your clothes on the hanger and undamaged, however, I noticed that these will fall off when you hang them in doorways, making for some frustrating laundry work/outfit planning. It's pretty unsubstantial, but I'm a doorway hanger for short term purposes, and these are no fun for that. 4 stars since these weren't meant to be hung on doorway trim and do everything else they're supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S. Long

customer_reviews.title: Breaking bad.........
customer_reviews.text: I have loved these hangers but I am wondering if there has been a change in how they are manufactured. When I received this order three hangers were broken before I got them out of the package. And, as I have attempted to use them another three broke when I picked them up. I was not hanging heavy items on them......blouses. This is so disappointing..........I guess I will have to shop for a new hanger solution.
customer_reviews.author: sallygal

customer_reviews.title: Broken when arrived
customer_reviews.text: I usually LOVE these hangers. I won’t buy any others. The off brand ones don’t hold up to my two boys yanking things off them in the closet. They are slim & keep items from falling off. I ordered two packs of these. When they arrived, there were two broken in the package. This is very disappointing. I am only taking off one star, because I assume that was a shipping issue. If these are like my usual hangers, the rest will be strong and durable.
customer_reviews.author: blissfulfour

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these hangers for about seven years now. I love them! I am able to get so many more clothes in the closet since I switched to these. I have purchased them for friends and family members who also love them. They have a clothing extender so you can stack more than one hanger together and they cascade down. I use that for dresses and love it. Highly recommend purchasing that extra item. I also hang most of my clothes when they are wet and have never had a hanger bleed, even when it is black or dark gray.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Levine

customer_reviews.title: I love these hangers!
customer_reviews.text: The Joy hangers are my absolute favorite. I became addicted to velvet hangers and began replacing my closet with them over time. I've tried alternatives from Ross and from Costco and they are flimsy and difficult to hang shirts on because of their flimsiness. The Joy ones are strong and nice. This is my third pack so far!
customer_reviews.author: Academic Petunia

customer_reviews.title: One hangar arrived broken....
customer_reviews.text: I joyfully opened my box, excited to prove to my son how much he needed these hangars in his closet and to my dismay, one is broken - in half. Okay, one out of 24 might not seem like bad odds, but it makes me wonder about the quality of the hangars. How much wear and tear will I get? Will all of them break eventually??? I beyond disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: I changed over my whole closet to use this type of hanger. I bought a few at first for those troublesome garments that slip off the hanger, but when I saw how well they clung to clothes, plus how easily they fit our small main closet, I was a convert.
customer_reviews.author: Testmaven

customer_reviews.title: Broke before I even used them.
customer_reviews.text: I just got these hanger today and the 2nd hanger broke just picking it up. I never even got to hang a shirt on it. I kept reading how nice these are so decided to try them. I think I may have made a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Bring joy to your clothes
customer_reviews.text: I have lots of clothes and every item is on a Joy hanger. I ordered because I just needed more was the reason for the purchase. I love them and don’t get fooled by cheap knockoffs in stores
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are amazing! They are strong. Yet, they do not take up too much space. If you want to get organized and have more room in your closet, definitely get a couple of sets of these hangers. Get the pant/skirt clips., too. You will be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: vernondoughty

customer_reviews.title: Gained More Space!
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers. Little by little I have replaced hangers in my closet. These are thin and using these I gained additional space Love them!

customer_reviews.title: LoVE EM’
customer_reviews.text: I love these hangers. I can’t count how many of these I have but I always seem to be purchasing more. They work great, save space, and keep most clothes pressed.

customer_reviews.title: make sure you only use for lightweight garments
customer_reviews.text: To me, a hanger is a hanger. I never thought hanging a long terry robe on it would just rip the metal part right out of the plastic. For shirts, they are nice and flat and don't let the garment slip off.
customer_reviews.author: jangls

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, Sturdy and lightweight to handle
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these hangers on many occasions. I have always been very pleased with the quality and fast shipment. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Joy hangers are the best! Great value on Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: I know there are other velvet hangers out there, but I’ve only purchased the Joy brand and they’ve been so strong and reliable I refuse to buy anything else.

customer_reviews.title: I think I will transfer some of these hangers to my coat closet so that my guests can see how absolutely beautiful they are
customer_reviews.text: Just received my set of Huggable Hangers. Immediately, rearranged my entire closet. Not only do the hangers hug the clothing so well that nothing slips off, they look so elegant. Can't wait to get more. As a matter of fact, I think I will transfer some of these hangers to my coat closet so that my guests can see how absolutely beautiful they are.

customer_reviews.title: Fe;t covered hangers.
customer_reviews.text: Love these hangers. Clothes stay put and don't fall off when putting them in the closet.

customer_reviews.title: These leave shoulder bumps in sweaters or knit tops
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these so his jackets don't slip off of the hangers and I like that about them, too. However, they do leave shoulder bumps in my sweaters and knit tops, so I'll be ordering more of the Tosnail hangers.

customer_reviews.title: Go for the original
customer_reviews.text: I’ve given up on the knock offs. These are the most durable in my experience.

customer_reviews.title: Helped me Organize My Closet
customer_reviews.text: These are great because they have such a thin profile. I've slowly started switching out all of the hangers in my house to these and I am able to fit so much more in my closets.
customer_reviews.author: Dana H.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.  Just what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I mean... these hangers are sturdy and i used them to hang lots of clothing. Note: they will pick up pet hair so keep them up off he furniture if you have pets!!

customer_reviews.title: Not the Real Deal
customer_reviews.text: These are not the authentic Joy Mangano hangers. Several have snapped and broken.

customer_reviews.title: Best quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a set earlier, loved them. They are pricey so I tried a couple of less expensive brands and there was no comparison! Joy Mangano is the only way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Causey

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: More room in my closet and clothes don’t slip off of the hangers!
customer_reviews.author: BeckyB

product_meta.title: Joy Mangano 24 Pk Suit/Shirt Huggable Hangers, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackHuggable hangers are the original game Changer - Saving one closet at a time! with our clever curvy design and velvet touch, your silky and strap items will never fall again. Additional accessories give you options to hold more than just shirts and suits - clips for your skirts, cascading hooks to maximize your space, extra bars to keep those pants folded perfectly and even flower accessory hangers for hanging belts, scarves, jewelry, ties and much more. Huggable hangers will give you that extra closet space you always wanted for both you and your kids
feature_bullets: Hold everything from heavy winter coats to delicate dresses
Velvety surface prevents clothes from slipping

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars806 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
